Look's like you get Saitou after all, MissB *YOU* snagged the third 
post.  Barb, how does she manage to do these things??

Let's see, does that make me Takeda?  Where's Serizawa Kamo's 
list...  Matsubara?  I don't know a single thing about him!!  
Although... if this post counts and makes it on time... I do know 
*some* things about Takeda... like Saitou killed him.  Wonderful...

phil (holding out for the ninth post and Suzuki of the Sekihoutai)
